summary: Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships - and whether they can stay alive.
cast: Rhys Wakefield|Logan Miller|Ashley Hinshaw|Natalie Hall|Rohan Kymal|Adam David Thompson|Ronald Ogden|Bernard David Jones|Brad Mills|April Billingsley|Peter Luis Zimmerman|Josh Warren|Chelsea Hayes|Joey Nappo|Marla Malcolm|Megan Hayes|Chrissy Chambers|Ronke|Crystal Lo|Joy Brunson|Jonathan Kleitman|Hannah Kasulka|Max Calder|Daniel Brule|Bobby Jordan|Colleen Dengel|Chase Steven Anderson|Joanna Blair|Rachel Brooks|Suzanne Dengel|Megan Dovell|Brenna Gates|Rhoda Griffis|Valyn Hall|Hilary Hunter|Cait Johnson|Margaret Joiner|Benjamin Lamm|Carolyn Lloyd|Christopher Marrone|Raquel Offield|Alex Preston|Lilly Roberson|Mitchell Schwartz|Gabrielle Stein|Bill Szymanski|Jermaine Thomas|Stephen Warner|Kasey Williamson|Nic Wolfe|Caleb Woods|Veronica Yung|Gracie Zane|Marisela Zumbado
